InstructionData.Instructions:
### Power Management ### alias Self db
# Power Management alias PowerInputAmt r0 # from Cable Analyzer In alias PowerOutputAmt r1 # from Cable Analyzer Out alias CurrentBatteryRatio r2 alias NeedLights r3
# Solar Tracking alias HorizontalAngle r5 alias VerticalAngle r6 alias AdjustedHorizontalAngle r7 alias AdjustedVerticalAngle r8 alias CurrentIrradiance r9
# Device Hashes define CableAnalyzerHash HASH("StructureCableAnalysizer") define CableAnalyzerIn HASH("Cable Analyzer - Power In") define CableAnalyzerOut HASH("Cable Analyzer - Power Out") define StationBatteryHash HASH("StructureBattery") define SolidGeneratorHash HASH("StructureSolidFuelGenerator") define MediumLEDHash HASH("StructureConsoleLED1x2") define PowerInLED HASH("LED - Power In") define PowerOutLED HASH("LED - Power Out") define DaySensorHash HASH("StructureDaylightSensor") define SolarPanelHash HASH("StructureSolarPanelDual")
# Power Settings define PowerMode 2 # LED Display Mode define MinBatteryRatio 0.2 define MaxBatteryRatio 0.8 define MinIrradiance 1
# Offsets for Solar Panel define PanelHorizontalOffset 180 define PanelVerticalOffset 90
Init: sbn MediumLEDHash PowerInLED Mode PowerMode sbn MediumLEDHash PowerInLED Color Color.Green
sbn MediumLEDHash PowerOutLED Mode PowerMode sbn MediumLEDHash PowerOutLED Color Color.Red
Main: yield jal HandlePowerConsumption jal HandleSolar jal HandleNightLights jal HandleBackupPower j Main
HandlePowerConsumption: lbn PowerInputAmt CableAnalyzerHash CableAnalyzerIn PowerActual Maximum sbn MediumLEDHash PowerInLED Setting PowerInputAmt
lbn PowerOutputAmt CableAnalyzerHash CableAnalyzerOut PowerActual Maximum sbn MediumLEDHash PowerOutLED Setting PowerOutputAmt j ra
HandleSolar: lb HorizontalAngle DaySensorHash Horizontal Maximum lb VerticalAngle DaySensorHash Vertical Maximum
add AdjustedHorizontalAngle HorizontalAngle PanelHorizontalOffset sub AdjustedVerticalAngle PanelVerticalOffset VerticalAngle
sb SolarPanelHash Horizontal AdjustedHorizontalAngle sb SolarPanelHash Vertical AdjustedVerticalAngle j ra
HandleNightLights: lb CurrentIrradiance DaySensorHash SolarIrradiance Maximum #s Self Setting CurrentIrradiance # TODO: Handle lights j ra
HandleBackupPower: lb CurrentBatteryRatio StationBatteryHash Ratio Average s Self Setting CurrentBatteryRatio blt CurrentBatteryRatio MinBatteryRatio EnableBackupPower bgt CurrentBatteryRatio MaxBatteryRatio DisableBackupPower j ra
EnableBackupPower: sb SolidGeneratorHash On 1 j ra
DisableBackupPower: sb SolidGeneratorHash On 0 j ra
